channel.title: Code on Shreyas Ragavan
channel.description: Recent content in Code on Shreyas Ragavan

item.title: EdX HarvardX PH125.1x: Data Science: R Basics
item.description: The course covered an introduction to using R to extract, manipulate and thus analyse data. It basically lays the foundations to using R in data science. Verified EdX Certificate of Achievement Course exercises are linked with a Datacamp course. Data Science R basics Course Notes and code This Jupyter notebook contains code written while following along with the course, which was expanded to illustrate concepts and notes.

item.title: On-line Courses: Code School
item.description: Completed several courses covering python, git, SQL,regular expressions. Most of these courses were completed during the occasional Free Weekend opportunities from Code School, where the paid courses are available to be completed at no cost, for an entire weekend.” My Code School Report is no longer available, since Pluralsight seem to be revamping these courses. However, these were great introductory courses.
